lite.name: Lite
lite.description: Essential workflow agents with core document and debugging skills optimized for CLI
lite.useCase: Users wanting comprehensive CLI workflow management with essential document processing and debugging capabilities
lite.targetUsers: Beginners, evaluators, terminal-focused developers wanting balanced features

standard.name: Standard
standard.description: Complete workflow and development team with enhanced testing and validation skills for CLI workflows
standard.useCase: Professional terminal-based development with full team coordination, testing, and comprehensive skill set
standard.targetUsers: Professional CLI developers, teams, quality-focused terminal users

pro.name: Pro
pro.description: Complete installation with all capabilities optimized for advanced CLI-based development and automation
pro.useCase: Full-featured installation for users needing all AI codegen, document processing, testing, and terminal automation capabilities
pro.targetUsers: Power users, enterprises, DevOps teams, terminal workflow enthusiasts
